sqls.sql: SELECT I.ID AS id, I.JOB_NAME AS jobName, I.JOB_PLACE AS jobPlace, I.JOB_MONTH_WAGES_FIRST AS jobMonthWagesFirst, I.JOB_MONTH_WAGES_SECOND AS jobMonthWagesSecond, I.JOB_MONTH AS jobMonth, I.FIRM_ID AS firmId, I.USER_ID AS userId, I.STATUS AS iStatus, I.ISSTOCK AS isstock, I.RESULT AS result, I.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, I.CANDIDATE_ID AS candidateId FROM offer_invite I {#param}
